page.title: 19BEHIND THE COUNTERS-S.ALDIS
page.content: {In the shop,date-coding is a nightmare - once on fats/biscuits now on canned/ bottled soft drinks/beers dating from 3 months ahead to 1990!{Ordering is {difficult}-orders can't keep pace with popular items then just as suddenly popularity fades.Products popular when {TV}ads appear then don't sell when Ads off-air.Recent{TV}piece on sausages & their large fat content resulted in sales dropping & customers looking for alternatives.Sales of porkpies/pasties have slumped & cake/biscuits checked for additives. After closing - shelves are sorted out, freezers de-frosted; book-work done and with dreaded VAT of 15% only on some goods this causes fun & games when stock-taking! Open every day except Sunday;{the nationwide dis- {cussion now is Sunday opening -we feel {Sunday is our 1 day of rest & a family {day - others have leisure,why not us?
